A: 1. Peaceful Co-existence simply means different people living together in _ (a) conflict (b) peace (c) anger

4. God wants us to live peacefully with others in the _ (a) house (b) community (c) church
5. Which two brothers in the Bible reconciled after one took the blessings of the other? (a) Cain and Abel (b) Esau and Jacob (c) Moses and Aaron
6. _ and Onesimus are examples of people desiring peaceful co-existence (a) Peter (b) Paul (c) Philemon
7. Isaac prevented a quarrel with _ (a) Lot (b) Abimelech (c) Saul
8. Abraham prevented a quarrel between him and his nephew, _ (a) Esau (b) Lot (c) Jacob
9. It is good to show _ to others (a) hatred (b) love (c) indifference
10. Jesus wants us to show love and _ to people (a) hostility (b) hospitality (c) dishonesty
11. We should tell people the _ and be open-minded to them (a) lies (b) truth (c) secrets
12. Jonathan loved David as his own _ (a) brother (b) soul (c) friend
13. Who was Jonathan's father? (a) David (b) Saul (c) Samuel
14. King Saul planned to _ David (a) promote (b) kill (c) help
15. Jonathan _ David by telling him Saul's plans (a) betrayed (b) saved (c) ignored
16. Jonathan and David made a _ (a) promise (b) covenant (c) treaty
17. Pupils should show love to those in _ (a) school (b) danger (c) class
18. We should give help to the _ (a) rich (b) strong (c) needy
19. One way to show love is to _ our belongings with others (a) hide (b) share (c) keep
20. We should _ one another when there is danger (a) abandon (b) protect (c) criticize
B: 2. According to Jesus, what should we do if somebody offends us?
3. Name one pair of individuals from the Bible who desired peaceful co-existence.
4. Who saved David from King Saul's plan to kill him?
5. List one way pupils can show love to one another.
C: 1. Who taught us to live peacefully with others?
2. Name the nephew Abraham prevented a quarrel with.
3. Who loved David as his own soul?
4. What was King Saul's plan for David?

answers_B: Different people living together in peace.
Forgive the person and live happily together.
